snippet: Robbie Rogers, the soccer player who announced he was gay in February and retired, trained with the Los Angeles Galaxy.
abstract: Robbie Rogers, soccer player who announced he was gay in February and retired, is training with Los Angeles Galaxy; under Major League Soccer rules, his rights would be held by the Chicago Fire if he were to return to play.
lead_paragraph: Robbie Rogers, the soccer player who announced he was gay in February and retired, trained with the Los Angeles Galaxy.

headline.main: Rogers, Soccer Player Who Came Out, Trains Again
